pinyin: nǐ yǐ jīng shuì jiào le ma?
english: Have you already gone to sleep?

allWords.English: you, you (informal, as opposed to courteous 您
go to sleep, to go to bed, to sleep

particle indicating completed action, (completed action marker), (modal particle indicating change of state, situation now), (modal particle intensifying preceding clause), to finish, to achieve, variant of 瞭|了, (of eyes) bright, clear-sighted, to understand clearly, unofficial variant of 瞭
question particle, see 嗎啡|吗啡, morphine, (question particle for "yes-no" questions)
